price: ហើយយើងមិនបានបំពានលើពួកគេឡើយ ក៏ប៉ុន្ដែពួកគេ ទេដែលជាអ្នកបានបំពាននោះ។
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
